channel.title: social networks on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in social networks on Damien Saunders

item.title: What do you think of the new look Twitter
item.description: So what do you think of the new look for Twitter? It’s feeling cleaner and the style change adds some freshness. But is this the first step in the wrong direction for brand pages? Will we all end-up with old-skool MySpace style pages?

item.title: Google+ You can add me to your circles
item.description: Google+ is the new social network which has everybody talking. If you haven’t joined in yet, it’s nothing new. Except it’s all about you and me and everyone we know. So please add me to your circles and let’s get to know a bit more about each other. Have you added me to your Google+ http://damiens.ws/ql8xsS
